channel.title: Comments on: G. K. Beale discusses some contemporary attacks on Inspiration

item.title: By: Bob Gonzales
item.dc:creator: Bob Gonzales
item.description:
Dr. Barcellos,
Thanks for posting this! I recently read portions of Beale's book The Erosion of Inerrancy in Evangelicalism. Excellent book and greatly needed in our day.
Your servant, Bob Gonzales
item.content:encoded:
Dr. Barcellos,

Thanks for posting this! I recently read portions of Beale’s book The Erosion of Inerrancy in Evangelicalism. Excellent book and greatly needed in our day.
